name: Programmer Nightmare (LudumDare 47)
description:
Oh No!! You feel asleep while working on you GameJam game, now you must collect all the JavaScript symbols and keywords to escape the endless dream, and finish you game!

Made in 48 hours for LudumDare 47 Compo - "Stuck in a loop"

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/programmer-nightmare
